#summary URLFor([host,action,protocol,controller,onlyPath,anchor,params,route,id])
#labels api,1.0

*Description*:

Creates an internal URL based on supplied arguments.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *route* || string || false ||  || Name of a route that you have configured ||
|| *controller* || string || false ||  || Name of the controller to include in the URL ||
|| *action* || string || false ||  || Name of the action to include in the URL ||
|| *key* || numeric || false || 0 || Id to include in the URL ||

|| *params* || string || false ||  || Any additional params to be set in the query string ||
|| *anchor* || string || false ||  || Sets an anchor name to be appended to the path ||
|| *onlyPath* || boolean || false || true || If true, returns only the relative URL (no protocol, host name or port) ||

|| *host* || string || false ||  || Set this to override the current host (domain name) ||
|| *protocol* || string || false ||  || Set this to override the current protocol (http) ||
|| *port* || string || false ||  || Set this to override the current protocol (http) ||

*Examples*:

{{{
#URLFor(controller="account", action="logOut")#
}}}

{{{
#URLFor(action="comments", anchor="comment10")#
}}}

*Related*:

 * RequestHandling (chapter)
 * LinkingPages (chapter)
